author: James Van Straten, AI Boost
title: Cardone Capital Adds 1,000 BTC, Eyes 3,000 in Bold Bitcoin Strategy
description: The real estate mogul integrated $100 million in BTC into his firm's balance sheet, eyeing more crypto-backed growth.
content:
Grant Cardone, the well-known real estate investor, has announced that his firm, Cardone Capital, has added 1,000 BTC to its balance sheet.
